item.title: Mysql Commands
item.description: Enter MySQL prompt as root user sudo mysql -u root -p Show Users and Databases show databases; select host, user, password from mysql.user; User Commands # To create a new MySQL user account, run the following command: CREATE USER 'newuser'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'user_password'; # To grant access from another host, change the hostname part (localhost) with the remote machine IP. # For example, to grant access from a machine with IP 10.

item.title: NodeJS Environment
item.description: To create a new package.json npm init -y To install a package npm i <package-name> sudo npm i -g nodemon To install a local package.json npm install To run node file node app.js To use nodemon to auto-restart server nodemon app.js

item.title: Python Environment
item.description: Create and start Python Virtual Environment python3 -m venv venv source venv/bin/activate To install a local requirements.txt venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt venv/bin/pip install gunicorn To Exit Venv deactivate To create requirements.txt pip freeze > requirements.txt To remove installed plugins pip freeze | xargs pip uninstall -y To run flask app flask app.py
